item.title: Fix Ticwatch Lag
item.description: Lets fix the lag on the TicWatch. There is tons of bloat that needs to be removed to get a responsive interface.

item.title: How to Speed Up Your Amazon Fire Tablet
item.description: This Guide goes over over debloating amazon fire tablets and getting Google Store and regular tablet functionality out of them.

item.title: Debloat Android
item.description: This article goes over using ADB Platform Tools and utilizing adb to uninstall packages by using these tools.

item.title: Degoogle Apps
item.description: This article goes over the apps that work and don’t work with a Degoogled phone without google play services installed

item.title: Get rid of Amazon Fire Launcher without root access
item.description: This How-To shows you how to get rid of Amazon Fire Launcher without root access. Amazon Fire 5.3.3 OS canâ€™t be downgraded or rooted, and since the Fire tablet line auto-updates, this leads many folks with the horrible experience of using the Fire OS with their gimped store/subscriptions.
